Html:
I've been digging through the documentation and examples, but I don't see any way of automatically taking an existing populated array variable (like a two-dimensional array of data returned from a database query, for example) and inserting the data into a worksheet in a PHPExcel object?

I was planning on writing a routine to do something like this, just wanted to make sure that I'm not re-inventing the wheel here. Thanks!
Nope, no re-inventing here :-) There's no such routine included. You can post your code here if you want to, perhaps we can include it in the next version of PHPExcel.
